actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Tariff Schedules of the United States to repeal the tariff treatment applied to articles of metal exported for processing and returned for further processing in the United States and to articles assembled abroad from U.S. products.

summary.text: Eliminates the import duty under the Tariff Schedules of the United States to articles of metal exported for processing and returned for further processing in the United States and to articles assembled abroad from United States products.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Tariff Schedules of the United States to repeal the tariff treatment applied to articles of metal exported for processing and returned for further processing in the United States and to articles assembled abroad from U.S. products.
